lead_paragraph: Investment firm Standard Life agreed Monday to buy Aberdeen Asset Management for 3.8 billion pounds ($4.7 billion) to create Britain's largest asset management company.

headline.main: North Korea Launch Could Be Test of New Attack Strategy, Japan Analysts Say
